network.param.modules.person.vendor

Interface IVendorManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VendorManager

    public interface IVendorManager
    Perform vendor related operations.

    IVendorManager add/invite/edit/get/getAll vendors from the ParamNetwork. Using NetworkManager can able to access this reference.

    IVendorManager vendorManager = networkManager.getVendorManager();

    Want to perform any bulk upload items to implement this interface IBulkImport interface for remote files, for local files use FileBulkFileImportConfig.

    ICatalogue defines below categories of operations:

    • addVendor method for add vendor object into ParamNetwork

    • inviteVendor method for inviting vendor into ParamNetwork

    • getAllVendors method for get all vendor IDs from ParamNetwork

    • addTemplate method for adding vendor templates into ParamNetwork

    • getTemplate method for getting vendor template from ParamNetwork

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Detail

      • inviteVendor

        void inviteVendor(IPersonTemplate vendorTemplate,
                  IVendor vendor)
           throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                  InvalidConfigException,
                  NetworkException
        Method send invitation to vendor.

        Method will send invitation to vendor, it excepts ParamID or emailID. If paramID or Email is null it will throw InvalidConfigException and If template is not found it will throw IPersonTemplate exception, Otherwise it will send invitation to vendor.

        Parameters:
        vendorTemplate - Vendor template Object.
        vendor - invitation will be send to Vendor emailID/ParamID
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • inviteVendor

        void inviteVendor(java.lang.String vendorTemplateID,
                  IVendor vendor)
           throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                  InvalidConfigException,
                  NetworkException
        Method send invitation to vendor.

        Method will send invitation to vendor, it excepts ParamID or emailID. If paramID or Email is null it will throw InvalidConfigException and If template is not found it will throw IPersonTemplate exception, Otherwise it will send invitation to vendor.

        Parameters:
        vendorTemplateID - Vendor template ID.
        vendor - invitation will be send to Vendor emailID/ParamID
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • addTemplate

        void addTemplate(IPersonTemplate personTemplatePage)
          throws NetworkException,
                 InvalidConfigException
        Method add new vendor template into the param network.

        Method will creating new vendor template. If any require fields are missing then it will throw InvalidConfigException exception, Otherwise it will add template into the network.

        Parameters:
        personTemplatePage - Vendor template ID.
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

        Method return given template type vendor templates.
        Parameters:
        personTemplateType - Template filter type
        Returns:
        All vendor template ID's
        Throws:

      • getTemplate

        IPersonTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.String id)
                     throws NetworkException,
                            AccessDeniedException,
                            TemplateNotFoundException
        Method return vendor template for a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Template id
        Returns:
        All vendor template ID's
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException

      • addVendor

        void addVendor(java.lang.String personTemplatePageID,
               IVendor vendor)
        throws NetworkException,
               AccessDeniedException,
               TemplateNotFoundException
        Method add vendor for a given template.

        addVendor(String, IVendor) add new vendor if template is exists in the network and having enough access rights and all vendor data is filled, Otherwise it will throw an error.

        Parameters:
        personTemplatePageID - Template id
        vendor - Vendor to be add.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template ID not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException

      • getVendor

        IVendor getVendor(java.lang.String id)
           throws NetworkException,
                  AccessDeniedException
        Method returns the vendor for a given vendor.

        getVendor(String) get the vendor if template vendor exists and having enough access rights access vendor information then it will return vendor, Otherwise it will throw an error.

        Parameters:
        id - vendor blockchain ID
        Returns:
        Vendor
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error

        Returns:
